data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Suzhou, Anhui, China that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Suzhou, Anhui, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Suzhou, Anhui, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,397,494 lost in Suzhou that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Suzhou, Anhui, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 196,806 believers in Suzhou to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,397,494 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Suzhou, Anhui, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the county of Suzhou, Anhui, China has a population of 2,594,300.

We estimate Suzhou has 196,806 people who might know Jesus, 41,911 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,355,583 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Suzhou. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
